00003 /***************************************************************************/
00004 /* RSC IDENTIFIER: NEW ZEALAND MAP GRID
00005  *
00006  * ABSTRACT
00007  *
00008  *    This component provides conversions between Geodetic coordinates 
00009  *    (latitude and longitude) and New Zealand Map Grid coordinates
00010  *    (easting and northing).
00011  *
00012  * ERROR HANDLING
00013  *
00014  *    This component checks parameters for valid values.  If an invalid value
00015  *    is found the error code is combined with the current error code using 
00016  *    the bitwise or.  This combining allows multiple error codes to be
00017  *    returned. The possible error codes are:
00018  *
00019  *       NZMG_NO_ERROR              : No errors occurred in function
00020  *       NZMG_LAT_ERROR             : Latitude outside of valid range
00021  *                                      (-33.5 to -48.5 degrees)
00022  *       NZMG_LON_ERROR             : Longitude outside of valid range
00023  *                                      (165.5 to 180.0 degrees)
00024  *       NZMG_EASTING_ERROR         : Easting outside of valid range
00025  *                                      (depending on ellipsoid and
00026  *                                       projection parameters)
00027  *       NZMG_NORTHING_ERROR        : Northing outside of valid range
00028  *                                      (depending on ellipsoid and
00029  *                                       projection parameters)
00030  *       NZMG_ELLIPSOID_ERROR       : Invalid ellipsoid - must be International
00031  *
00032  * REUSE NOTES
00033  *
00034  *    NEW ZEALAND MAP GRID is intended for reuse by any application that 
00035  *    performs a New Zealand Map Grid projection or its inverse.
00036  *    
00037  * REFERENCES
00038  *
00039  *    Further information on NEW ZEALAND MAP GRID can be found in the 
00040  *    Reuse Manual.
00041  *
00042  *    NEW ZEALAND MAP GRID originated from :  
00043  *                      U.S. Army Topographic Engineering Center
00044  *                      Geospatial Information Division
00045  *                      7701 Telegraph Road
00046  *                      Alexandria, VA  22310-3864
00047  *
00048  * LICENSES
00049  *
00050  *    None apply to this component.
00051  *
00052  * RESTRICTIONS
00053  *
00054  *    NEW ZEALAND MAP GRID has no restrictions.
00055  *
00056  * ENVIRONMENT
00057  *
00058  *    NEW ZEALAND MAP GRID was tested and certified in the following 
00059  *    environments:
00060  *
00061  *    1. Solaris 2.5 with GCC, version 2.8.1
00062  *    2. Windows 95 with MS Visual C++, version 6
00063  *
00064  * MODIFICATIONS
00065  *
00066  *    Date              Description
00067  *    ----              -----------
00068  *    09-14-00          Original Code
00069  *    03-2-07           Original C++ Code
00070  *
00071  *
00072  */
00073 
00074 
00075 /***************************************************************************/

00077  *                               INCLUDES
00078  */

00094  *    GeodeticCoordinates.h   - defines geodetic coordinates
00095  *    CoordinateConversionException.h - Exception handler
00096  *    ErrorMessages.h  - Contains exception messages
00097  */

00108 const double PI = 3.14159265358979323e0;        /* PI     */
00109 const double PI_OVER_2 = (PI / 2.0);                 
00110 const double TWO_PI = (2.0 * PI);                 
00111 const double MAX_LAT = (-33.5 * PI / 180.0);    /* -33.5 degrees */
00112 const double MIN_LAT = (-48.5 * PI / 180.0);    /* -48.5 degrees */
00113 const double MAX_LON = (180.0 * PI / 180.0);    /* 180 degrees */
00114 const double MIN_LON = (165.5 * PI / 180.0);    /* 165.5 degrees */
00115 
00116 const char* International = "IN";
00117 
00118 /* NZMG projection Parameters */
00119 const double NZMG_Origin_Lat = (-41.0);               /* Latitude of origin, in radians */
00120 const double NZMG_Origin_Long = (173.0 * PI / 180.0); /* Longitude of origin, in radians */
00121 const double NZMG_False_Northing = 6023150.0;         /* False northing, in meters */
00122 const double NZMG_False_Easting = 2510000.0;          /* False easting, in meters */
00123 
00124 /* Maximum variance for easting and northing values for International. */
00125 const double NZMG_Max_Easting = 3170000.0;
00126 const double NZMG_Max_Northing = 6900000.0;
00127 const double NZMG_Min_Easting = 1810000.0;
00128 const double NZMG_Min_Northing = 5160000.0;
00129 
00130 struct Complex
00131 {
00132   double real;
00133   double imag;
00134 }; 
00135 
00136 double A[] = { 0.6399175073, -0.1358797613, 0.063294409,
00137               -0.02526853, 0.0117879, -0.0055161,
00138                0.0026906, -0.001333, 0.00067, -0.00034 };
00139 
00140 Complex B[] = { { 0.7557853228, 0.0 },
00141                 { 0.249204646, 0.003371507 },
00142                 { -0.001541739, 0.041058560 },
00143                 { -0.10162907, 0.01727609 },
00144                 { -0.26623489, -0.36249218 },
00145                 { -0.6870983, -1.1651967 } };
00146 
00147 Complex C[] = { { 1.3231270439, 0.0 },
00148                 { -0.577245789, -0.007809598 },
00149                 { 0.508307513, -0.112208952 },
00150                 { -0.15094762, 0.18200602 },
00151                 { 1.01418179, 1.64497696 },
00152                 { 1.9660549, 2.5127645 } };
00153 
00154 double D[] = { 1.5627014243, 0.5185406398, -0.03333098,
00155               -0.1052906, -0.0368594, 0.007317,
00156                0.01220, 0.00394, -0.0013 };

00158 /************************************************************************/
00159 /*                              FUNCTIONS     
00160  *
00161  */
00162 
00163 /* Add two complex numbers */
00164 Complex add(Complex z1, Complex z2)
00165 {
00166   Complex z;
00167 
00168   z.real = z1.real + z2.real;
00169   z.imag = z1.imag + z2.imag;
00170 
00171   return z;
00172 }
00173 
00174 
00175 /* Multiply two complex numbers */
00176 Complex multiply(Complex z1, Complex z2)
00177 {
00178   Complex z;
00179 
00180   z.real = z1.real * z2.real - z1.imag * z2.imag;
00181   z.imag = z1.imag * z2.real + z1.real * z2.imag;
00182 
00183   return z;
00184 }
00185 
00186 
00187 /* Divide two complex numbers */
00188 Complex divide(Complex z1, Complex z2)
00189 {
00190   Complex z;
00191   double denom;
00192 
00193   denom = z2.real * z2.real + z2.imag * z2.imag;
00194   z.real = (z1.real * z2.real + z1.imag * z2.imag) / denom;
00195   z.imag = (z1.imag * z2.real - z1.real * z2.imag) / denom;
00196 
00197   return z;
00198 }

00200 
00201 NZMG::NZMG( char* ellipsoidCode ) :
00202   CoordinateSystem( 6378388.0, 1 / 297.0 )
00203 {
00204 /*
00205  * The constructor receives the ellipsoid code and sets
00206  * the corresponding state variables. If any errors occur, 
00207  * an exception is thrown with a description of the error.
00208  *
00209  *   ellipsoidCode : 2-letter code for ellipsoid           (input)
00210  */
00211 
00212   char errorStatus[500] = "";
00213 
00214   strcpy( NZMGEllipsoidCode, "IN" );
00215 
00216   if (strcmp(ellipsoidCode, International) != 0)
00217   { /* Ellipsoid must be International */
00218     strcat( errorStatus, ErrorMessages::nzmgEllipsoid );
00219   }
00220 
00221   if( strlen( errorStatus ) > 0)
00222     throw CoordinateConversionException( errorStatus );
00223 
00224   strcpy( NZMGEllipsoidCode, ellipsoidCode );
00225 }

00231   flattening = n.flattening;
00232 }

00239 
00240 NZMG& NZMG::operator=( const NZMG &n )
00241 {
00242   if( this != &n )
00243   {
00244     semiMajorAxis = n.semiMajorAxis;
00245     flattening = n.flattening;
00246   }
00247 
00248   return *this;
00249 }

00252 EllipsoidParameters* NZMG::getParameters() const
00253 {
00254 /*                         
00255  * The function getParameters returns the current ellipsoid
00256  * code.
00257  *
00258  *   ellipsoidCode : 2-letter code for ellipsoid          (output)
00259  */
00260 
00261   return new EllipsoidParameters( semiMajorAxis, flattening, (char*)NZMGEllipsoidCode );
00262 }

00264 
00265 MSP::CCS::MapProjectionCoordinates* NZMG::convertFromGeodetic( MSP::CCS::GeodeticCoordinates* geodeticCoordinates )
00266 {
00267 /*
00268  * The function convertFromGeodetic converts geodetic (latitude and
00269  * longitude) coordinates to New Zealand Map Grid projection (easting and northing)
00270  * coordinates, according to the current ellipsoid and New Zealand Map Grid 
00271  * projection parameters.  If any errors occur, an exception is thrown 
00272  * with a description of the error.
00273  *
00274  *    longitude         : Longitude (lambda), in radians       (input)
00275  *    latitude          : Latitude (phi), in radians           (input)
00276  *    easting           : Easting (X), in meters               (output)
00277  *    northing          : Northing (Y), in meters              (output)
00278  */
00279 
00280   Complex Zeta, z;
00281   int n;
00282   double dphi;
00283   double du, dlam;
00284   char errorStatus[50] = "";
00285 
00286   double longitude = geodeticCoordinates->longitude();
00287   double latitude = geodeticCoordinates->latitude();
00288 
00289   if ((latitude < MIN_LAT) || (latitude > MAX_LAT))
00290   {  /* Latitude out of range */
00291     strcat( errorStatus, ErrorMessages::latitude );
00292   }
00293   if ((longitude < MIN_LON) || (longitude > MAX_LON))
00294   {  /* Longitude out of range */
00295     strcat( errorStatus, ErrorMessages::longitude );
00296   }
00297 
00298   if( strlen( errorStatus ) > 0)
00299     throw CoordinateConversionException( errorStatus );
00300 
00301   dphi = (latitude * (180.0 / PI) - NZMG_Origin_Lat) * 3600.0 * 1.0e-5;
00302   du = A[9];
00303   for (n = 8; n >= 0; n--)
00304     du = du * dphi + A[n];
00305   du *= dphi;
00306 
00307   dlam = longitude - NZMG_Origin_Long;
00308 
00309   Zeta.real = du;
00310   Zeta.imag = dlam;
00311 
00312   z.real = B[5].real;
00313   z.imag = B[5].imag;
00314   for (n = 4; n >= 0; n--)
00315   {
00316     z = multiply(z, Zeta);
00317     z = add(B[n], z);
00318   }
00319   z = multiply(z, Zeta);
00320 
00321   double easting = (z.imag * semiMajorAxis) + NZMG_False_Easting;
00322   double northing = (z.real * semiMajorAxis) + NZMG_False_Northing;
00323 
00324   if ((easting < NZMG_Min_Easting) || (easting > NZMG_Max_Easting)) 
00325     throw CoordinateConversionException( ErrorMessages::easting );
00326   if ((northing < NZMG_Min_Northing) || (northing > NZMG_Max_Northing))
00327     throw CoordinateConversionException( ErrorMessages::northing );
00328 
00329   return new MapProjectionCoordinates( CoordinateType::newZealandMapGrid, easting, northing );
00330 }
00331 
00332 
00333 MSP::CCS::GeodeticCoordinates* NZMG::convertToGeodetic( MSP::CCS::MapProjectionCoordinates* mapProjectionCoordinates )
00334 {
00335 /*
00336  * The function convertToGeodetic converts New Zealand Map Grid projection
00337  * (easting and northing) coordinates to geodetic (latitude and longitude)
00338  * coordinates, according to the current ellipsoid and New Zealand Map Grid projection
00339  * coordinates.  If any errors occur, an exception is thrown with a description 
00340  * of the error.
00341  *
00342  *    easting           : Easting (X), in meters                  (input)
00343  *    northing          : Northing (Y), in meters                 (input)
00344  *    longitude         : Longitude (lambda), in radians          (output)
00345  *    latitude          : Latitude (phi), in radians              (output)
00346  */
00347 
00348   int i, n;
00349   Complex coeff;
00350   Complex z, Zeta, Zeta_Numer, Zeta_Denom, Zeta_sqr;
00351   double dphi;
00352   char errorStatus[50] = "";
00353 
00354   double easting = mapProjectionCoordinates->easting();
00355   double northing = mapProjectionCoordinates->northing();
00356 
00357   if ((easting < NZMG_Min_Easting) || (easting > NZMG_Max_Easting)) 
00358   { /* Easting out of range  */
00359     strcat( errorStatus, ErrorMessages::easting );
00360   }
00361   if ((northing < NZMG_Min_Northing) || (northing > NZMG_Max_Northing))
00362   { /* Northing out of range */
00363     strcat( errorStatus, ErrorMessages::northing );
00364   }
00365 
00366   if( strlen( errorStatus ) > 0)
00367     throw CoordinateConversionException( errorStatus );
00368 
00369   z.real = (northing - NZMG_False_Northing) / semiMajorAxis;
00370   z.imag = (easting - NZMG_False_Easting) / semiMajorAxis;
00371 
00372   Zeta.real = C[5].real;
00373   Zeta.imag = C[5].imag;
00374   for (n = 4; n >= 0; n--)
00375   {
00376     Zeta = multiply(Zeta, z);
00377     Zeta = add(C[n], Zeta);
00378   }
00379   Zeta = multiply(Zeta, z);
00380 
00381   for (i = 0; i < 2; i++)
00382   {
00383     Zeta_Numer.real = 5.0 * B[5].real;
00384     Zeta_Numer.imag = 5.0 * B[5].imag;
00385     Zeta_Denom.real = 6.0 * B[5].real;
00386     Zeta_Denom.imag = 6.0 * B[5].imag;
00387     for (n = 4; n >= 1; n--)
00388     {
00389       Zeta_Numer = multiply(Zeta_Numer, Zeta);
00390       coeff.real = n * B[n].real;
00391       coeff.imag = n * B[n].imag;
00392       Zeta_Numer = add(coeff, Zeta_Numer); 
00393 
00394       Zeta_Denom = multiply(Zeta_Denom, Zeta);
00395       coeff.real = (n+1) * B[n].real;
00396       coeff.imag = (n+1) * B[n].imag;
00397       Zeta_Denom = add(coeff, Zeta_Denom);
00398     }
00399     Zeta_sqr = multiply(Zeta, Zeta);
00400 
00401     Zeta_Numer = multiply(Zeta_Numer, Zeta_sqr);
00402     Zeta_Numer = add(z, Zeta_Numer);
00403 
00404     Zeta_Denom = multiply(Zeta_Denom, Zeta);
00405     Zeta_Denom = add(B[0], Zeta_Denom);
00406 
00407     Zeta = divide(Zeta_Numer, Zeta_Denom);  
00408   }
00409   dphi = D[8];
00410   for (n = 7; n >= 0; n--)
00411     dphi = dphi * Zeta.real + D[n];
00412   dphi *= Zeta.real;
00413     
00414   double latitude = NZMG_Origin_Lat + (dphi * 1.0e5 / 3600.0);
00415   latitude *= PI / 180.0;
00416   double longitude = NZMG_Origin_Long + Zeta.imag;
00417 
00418   if ((longitude > PI) && (longitude - PI < 1.0e-6))
00419     longitude = PI;
00420 
00421   if ((latitude < MIN_LAT) || (latitude > MAX_LAT))
00422     throw CoordinateConversionException( ErrorMessages::latitude );
00423   if ((longitude < MIN_LON) || (longitude > MAX_LON))
00424     throw CoordinateConversionException( ErrorMessages::longitude );
00425 
00426   return new GeodeticCoordinates( CoordinateType::geodetic, longitude, latitude );
00427 }
